title: Feet of Water to PSI Converter (ft H₂O → psi)

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: psi = ft H₂O × 0.4335 (at ~60°F) More generally: psi = (ft × ρ × g) ÷ 144 where ρ is water density (lb/ft³), g = 32.174 ft/s², and 144 is in² per ft².
